work in 19/01/05
====

# case01
## purpose
    To check GPU.
    `$ lspci | grep -i nvidia`
## prob
    Error message
    __lspci: command not found ubuntu__
## approach
    `$ sudo apt install pciutils`
    [url](https://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/linux-newbie-8/lspci-command-not-found-418455/)
----
